虞.definition: (literary) to expect; to anticipate; (literary) to be concerned about; to be apprehensive; (literary) to deceive; to dupe

虞世南.definition: Yu Shinan (558-638), politician of Sui and early Tang periods, poet and calligrapher, one of Four Great Calligraphers of early Tang 唐初四大家[Tang2 chu1 Si4 Da4 jia1]

虞喜.definition: Yu Xi, Chinese astronomer (c. 270-345), known for discovering the earth's precession

虞城.definition: Yucheng county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

虞城縣.definition: Yucheng county in Shangqiu 商丘[Shang1 qiu1], Henan

虞應龍.definition: Yu Yinglong, Yuan dynasty scholar, collaborated on the geographical encyclopedia Dayuan Dayi Tongzhi 大元大一統誌|大元大一统志

虞舜.definition: Yu Shun, one of Five legendary Emperors 五帝[wu3 di4]
